Articles.Content: As the title says, I need to get started with FAR since I have mastered the stock aerodynamics and Im now in search for a new challenge therfore FAR. But back to the point, If anyone got tips for building aircraft using FAR in KSP it would be appreciated. Thanks!
Start here. The main FAR thread is also full of knowledge, and after that just go browse any real-world aeronautical data, most of it is applicable to some degree.
Start here. It's the least you need to know. If you follow the rules, everything should be ok with FAR.
